name: Service Level Agreement (SLA - Ghana)
description: B2B Service Level Agreement including Ghanaian Tax Withholding (WHT) clauses and liability caps.

clauses.clause_text: THIS SERVICE LEVEL AGREEMENT is made between {{provider_name}} ('the Provider') and {{client_name}} ('the Client') on {{agreement_date}}.
The Provider shall provide the following services: {{service_scope_details}} (the 'Services').
The Provider guarantees an uptime of {{uptime_percentage}}% for the platform. Service response time for critical issues shall be no more than {{response_hours}} hours.

The monthly fee for the services is {{monthly_fee}} (GHS), exclusive of VAT/NHIL/GETFund. The Client shall deduct Withholding Tax (WHT) at the prevailing rate (currently {{wht_rate}}% for services) and provide the Provider with a WHT certificate within 30 days of payment.
The total liability of the Provider under this Agreement shall not exceed {{liability_cap_amount}} or the total fees paid by the Client in the {{preceding_months}} months preceding the claim.
Neither party shall be liable for any failure to perform its obligations due to events beyond its reasonable control, including acts of God, war, or nationwide power outages (GRIDCo/ECG failures).
